code: # Log-likelihood for two Gaussian blobs gaussian_blobs_loglik <- function(x) {   sigma <- 0.1   mu1 <- c(1, 1)   mu2 <- -c(1, 1)   sigma_inv <- diag(2) / sigma^2    if (!is.matrix(x)) dim(x) <- c(1, length(x))   dx1 <- sweep(x, 2, mu1)   dx2 <- sweep(x, 2, mu2)   val1 <- -0.5 * rowSums((dx1 %*% sigma_inv) * dx1)   val2 <- -0.5 * rowSums((dx2 %*% sigma_inv) * dx2)   matrixStats::rowLogSumExps(cbind(val1, val2)) }  # Uniform prior over [-5, 5] in each dimension prior <- create_uniform_prior(lower = -5, upper = 5, names = c("A", "B")) sampler <- ernest_sampler(gaussian_blobs_loglik, prior, n_points = 100) result <- generate(sampler, seed = 42, show_progress = FALSE) #> ℹ Created 100 live points. #> ✔ `min_logz` reached (0.0499807 < 0.05). smry <- summary(result) smry #> nested sampling results <ernest_run> #>  #> No. Points: 100 #> No. Iterations: 970 #> No. Lik.
